metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2461 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in OS Inputs in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to113.0.5672.63 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to enage inspecific UI interaction to potentially exploit heap corruption via craftedUI interaction. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
